# Introduction

This vignette showcases the reported adverse events and event classes in the PDSdatabase:

- How many adverse are listed in reports

- How many classes of events are listed in reports

- How many adverse events and classes of events are listed in reports

- What are the most frequent adverse events and classes of events listed in reports across child development stages

```{r}

library(PDSdatabase)
download_sqlite_db() #downloads to current working directory

```

Connect to the database:

```{r}

con <- connect_sqlite_db()

```


Disconnect database:

```{r}

disconnect_sqlite_db(con)

```
